txt.en:
'Now that the chickens are all in their pens and ready, we can turn to the next animal on the list: the pigs.

'The pigs didn't get out. They had the chance to, but that would have meant they'd have to stop just lying around. But things have been dry since the storm, and their wallow is more dust and dirt than mud.

'Everyone loves to see a pig roll around in the mud, almost as much as the pigs love to do it. There's a bucket near the pond nearby. Use it and bring a few pailfuls over to the pen to get it nice and wet and muddy.'
'I can hear the happy grunting from here!'
'Just bring the full buckets over to the pig-pen.'
One of the main features of the Northcotton Farmer's Market is its animal petting area.
The bucket can be found at the nearby pond.\n\nGerard Deephole asked you to mud the pigs.
Gerard Deephole is at the animal pens on the Northcotton Farm.\n\nGerard Deephole will be pleased to hear that the pigs have been mudded.
